## ShortcutRegistry.setKeyMap() method

Sets the key map. Setting the key map will override any default key mappings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setKeyMap(keyMap: {
        [key: string]: string[];
    }): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  keyMap | { \[key: string\]: string\[\]; } | The object with key code to shortcut names. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
